Package edu.iastate.cs309.hb6.foodtime.ui.home

Class HomeFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
edu.iastate.cs309.hb6.foodtime.ui.home.HomeFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HomeFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Dashboard Fragment: Home (Calendar) View the user's calendar and list of scheduled recipes (known as meals) for a given day of the week

    • removeMeal

      private void removeMeal(String UID, String day, String mealName, String removeAll)
      Remove a meal from a given day in the calendar
      Parameters:
      UID - - the user to remove a meal from their calendar
      day - - the given day of the week to remove the meal from
      mealName - - the name of the meal
      removeAll - - whether to disregard mealName and remove all meals or not
